title: LFM for a Ranked 5's team. Need members that are positive and want to improve
body: I'm really looking for a dedicated team of mature people to learn, get better, climb together and to make some new friends. Need to be a positive person that can take advice as well as give it. No raging or blaming others. Want to be a strong team that works it's way from the bottom. Add me if interested. The team name is Dothraki Dragons.

replies.body:
I am a s3 Support main.

IGN is Geuneul
i got spare time so ill join

sure I'm happy to try s4 support who also can kinda mid/top if needed 
love the team name btw X3

What ranked range are you taking in?
I'm currently a G3. Play mostly Support or Jg, able to fill all roles.
Although I have a tight schedule I do try to fit in LOL games as part of it.
So if you are willing to use me at least as sub, give me a add plz :)
